December 8, 2007, Brent worked with Ron in different groups

Ron has the rare combination of great intelligence combined with a down to earth personality.  It's obvious that Ron is one of those people that is great at everything he does yet he's one of the most humble people I have ever met.  He enjoys talking business and strategy and I personally have had dozens of terrific conversations with him on the subject.  Each such conversation has resulted in a much richer understanding of the topic for myself.  There isn't an organization in the world that couldn't use the services of a Ron LaSalvia.  Unfortunately he's the one and only.  Don't miss your chance to work with him.

Rich Waer
Operations Analyst at Raytheon Missile Systems
January 22, 2007, Rich reported directly to Ron

When I met Ron I was immediately impressed.  Sure, he was my new CO,  but there was something more, something deeper.  He had an innate grasp of the deepest meanings of the word LEADER.  He knew how to keep things professional while making them fun.  He readily separated the wheat from the chaff, concentrating his considerable skills and efforts on the truly important and discarding or delaying the rest.  Yet, unlike some of my earlier COs, he did not micromanage - he allowed me complete latitude to make the decisions I needed to make for the continued safe operation of our nuclear submarine.I trusted the man with my life, and would do so again.  What higher compliment can I pay him?
